item.title: Spawn a new npc
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Well, I was trying to edit KQ, so I took DeltaScape’s spawnanpc method, and added that. But then when I add this to make the 2nd form of kq come after the first one. I kill the first form, but the 2nd form does not spawn. Here is the method:

public void spawnANPC(int npcID, int absX, int absY, int height) { server.npcHandler.newNPC(npcID, (absX), (absY), height, absX + 3, absY + 3, absX - 3, absY - 3, 0, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(npcID), false); }

and here is the code i used for the 2nd form…

if(server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1158 && server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].HP <= 0){ server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(1160, 3485, 9483, 0); sendMessage("Prepare for the 2nd form!"); }

Whats up with it?

Read full topic
